auto_added_users_error: I couldnt find anybody from given input by issuer.

ticket_close_approve_desc: are you sure to close the ticket?
no_permission: You have no permission to that action.
delete_ticket_no_transcript: Deleting ticket without saving transcript. Because you didnt set transcript channel.
dm_ticket_close_desc: Your ticket {{- channel}} closed by {{- name}}. There is no transcript because staff member disabled it.
